882030.name: Fragmania.gg (BETA)
882030.description:
FragMania.GG is a third party matchmaking service (Currently in BETA) for Counter-Strike:Global Offensive. We offer:
- 128 Tick Servers
- 5v5 Ranked Matchmaking
- Ladders
- GOTV
- Practice Servers (TDM etc)
- Ladders
- Advanced Statistics

All accessible via our beta windows client.

Our service is currently available in the following regions/areas:
US-East
US-Central
US-West
Europe
Russia
